description:
We have opened registration for a new round of mentorships (https://wiki.codehub.org.uk/mentoring). This is an opportunity for everybody interested to meet up in person.

We will give an introduction to how we have been running the mentorship programme, followed by a discussion where you will be able to ask questions and make suggestions.

If you are interested in finding a mentor, please fill in this form:
https://forms.gle/zUeWpR65qjM9vF7e8

If you would like to be a mentor, the form is here:
https://forms.gle/LewoMpfi2Jr9CEHd9

Please also join the #mentoring channel on Slack (slack.codehub.org.uk).

This event will be part of Women's Tech Hub's Workshop Wednesdays at Desklodge House.
title: Mentorship Kickoff at Workshop Wednesdays
